translations: 平均有效压力（Mean Effective Pressure）；工程实践手册（Manuals of Engineering Practice）

sentences.sentence: Eighty-three elephants were lost in 2015 alone, and another fifty-one elephant were killed in 2016. "If this situation goes on, all the Gourma elephants will be killed by 2020," said a member of MEP. Luckily, the voice of MEP was heard.
sentences.translation: 仅在2015年就有83头大象失踪，2016年就有51头大象被杀害。“如果这种情况继续下去，到2020年，吉尔马的所有大象都将被猎杀。”马拉大象项目的一名成员说。幸运的是，MEP的诉求被听到了。

sentences.sentence: Pattern: Used to specify the message exchange pattern (MEP) for the operation.
sentences.translation: pattern：用于指定该操作的消息交换模式(message exchange pattern, mep)。
